title: Live Interview
subtitle: Practice coding interviews with AI feedback in real-time.
noPressure: No pressure, practice at your own pace

steps.feedback: Get instant AI feedback and guidance

chat.title: AI Interviewer
chat.empty: Start the conversation by sending a message

testcase.title: Testcase
testcase.runHint: Run your code to see results

endDialog.title: End Interview?
endDialog.description: Are you sure you want to end this interview? This will finalize your session and generate the evaluation report.

strengths.1: Clear explanation of your approach before coding
strengths.2: Good use of data structures for optimization
strengths.3: Considered edge cases and potential improvements

improvements.1: Consider testing your code with edge cases before submission
improvements.2: Could have discussed space-time trade-offs in more detail
improvements.3: Practice verbalizing your thought process while coding
